text: allahana kaigalu kattive endu yahudigalu heluttare. Kattalpadali avara kaigalu. Avara helikeya karana avaru sapitaradaru. Nijavagi allahana kaigalu dharala visalavagive. Avanu tanicchisidante kharcu maduttane. Nim'ma odeyanu nimagenannu ilisi kottiruvano adarindagi avaralli heccinavara vidroha mattu dhikkaravu mattastu heccalide. Navu punarut'thana dinadavaregu avara naduve vaira mattu vaisamyavannu bittiruvevu. Avaru yud'dhada benkiyannu bhugilebbisidaga allahanu adannu tanisi biduttane. Adare avaru bhumiyalli asanti habbalu sramisuttale iruttare. Allahanantu, asanti habbuvavarannu khandita meccuvudilla
